room_title: Escape room "American Revolution" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: What a great time!! Different types of puzzles -had us all busy working while having a blast! Can't wait to go back and do the serial killer escape room.

room_title: Escape room "American Revolution" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: This was so much fun! Working with a large group, it allowed us to work on all the pieces of the puzzle together. Can't wait to come try the other room!

room_title: Escape room "American Revolution" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: Awesome time great surprise for date night.This is a must for everyone to try.

room_title: Escape room "American Revolution" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: I went with my coworkers for a team building event. This was so much fun I will definitely be back again for another room.

room_title: Escape room "American Revolution" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: Great rooms and friendly staff. Lena was amazing! Have done all three rooms and every time is better than the last.

room_title: Escape room "American Revolution" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: What a fun experience! Well organized, the staff was excellent, the handcuffs made us all sweat a bit, but we powered through and would do other escape rooms in a heartbeat. Wish one was closer to Gresham!

room_title: Escape room "American Revolution" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: Never had ever done something like this. Looked on the Internet for stuff to do and found this place, and it was awesome!!! Would totally recommend anyone trimming this if you have not done so already!!! Will be back to try the other rooms !!!
